G.T.5587
SECRET.
BATTLE SITUATION - EVENING - 2nd SEPTEMBER, 1918.
1. WESTERN FRONT.
(a) British Front. During the morning the enemy have been counter-attacking very heavily between BEUGNY and RIENCOURT-LES-CAGNICOURT. South of LAGNICOURT he has pushed our troops back as far as tho BOIS-DE-VAULX.
We took LE TRANSL?Y this morning and have advanced our line towards ROCQUIGNY. We have taken the BOIS DE ST.PIERRE-VAAST, and are reported to be holding GOVERNMENT FARM.
(b) French Front. On the VESLE the enemy displays great vigilance and the French patrols are unable to cross the river.
ITALIAN AND MACEDONIAN FRONTS.
There is no change in the situation.
?al Staff,
War Office, S.W.1.
2nd September, 1918.
? at 6-35 p.m.
